Text: Just DL'd, seems legit. About 10 pages into it, and it checks out. Virus free per Avast. Also not supposed to hit stores till the 11'th. Thanks, uploader.

I was pretty gutted when I realised snuff was coming out 3 days after I left to go on holiday. Thought I would just check on here before heading to the airport on the off chance. You sir micron66, just made my day!

Mate, if I ever see you, I will kiss you lol. Been eagerly anticipating this book since I first found out about it nearly a year ago. Lost my job a couple of weeks ago and had to cancel my pre-order for a signed copy. This is going straight into my Kindle, and once I can I will be buying the book to complete my collection. I just hope that he is able to finish Raising Taxes.....
